tickets.title: Unable to login
tickets.request: I am unable to login to my account using my credentials. Please assist.

tickets.title: Payment not processed
tickets.request: I made a payment but it is not reflecting in my account. Can you check?

tickets.request: It would be great to have a dark mode option in the application.

tickets.title: Bug: App crashes on startup
tickets.request: The app crashes every time I try to open it. Please help resolve this issue.

tickets.title: Unable to reset password
tickets.request: I tried to reset my password but did not receive the reset email. Can you assist?
